responsibilities: Create visibility of Arize and Phoenix content through thought-provoking daily technical content distributed via AI community platforms such as Twitter, LinkedIn, and Reddit.
Build connections to Arize and Phoenix through viewership and consumption of AI-related materials.
Develop research, content, and video snippets that resonate in the AI community and relate to Arize in areas of Evaluation, AI Assistants, AI Agents, and AI Applications.
Write code, build AI applications, and create cookbooks that demonstrate the Arize product lines or other ecosystem tools for dissemination in the AI community.
Author a guide on AI social marketing to convert AI content consumption into OSS product usage and awareness.
category: Prompt Engineering and Large Language Models (LLMs)
activity: Fine-tuning and customization of language models
analysis: The Job Responsibilities focus on creating and distributing AI-related content, building connections through AI materials, developing research and content related to AI, and writing code for AI applications. There is no direct mention of training or fine-tuning large language models, which is the focus of this Activity. The responsibilities are more aligned with content creation and community engagement rather than model customization.
